app.title: Build Better
app.description: A suite of essential tools for developers, Fast, reliable, and easy to use.

history.title: History
history.desc: Tool usage history will appear here.

home.title: Developer Micro-Tools Collection
home.subtitle: A suite of essential tools for developers, Fast, reliable, and easy to use.

kinship.title: Chinese Kinship Calculator
kinship.desc: Calculate Chinese relative titles and relations.

image-joiner.title: Image Joiner
image-joiner.desc: Join multiple images vertically or horizontally. Supports drag sorting and auto alignment.
image-joiner.subtitle: Combine multiple photos into one long image. Drag to sort, auto resize, and customize spacing.

image-watermark.title: Image Watermark Tool
image-watermark.desc: Add text watermarks to images. Custom position, opacity, and rotation.
image-watermark.subtitle: Batch add text watermarks to photos. Secure your images locally.
image-watermark.drag_drop: Drag & drop images here, or click to select

image-converter.title: Image Format Converter
image-converter.desc: Convert images between JPG, PNG, and WebP formats.
image-converter.subtitle: Convert between JPG, PNG, and WebP. Support for background color filling.
image-converter.drag_drop: Drag & drop images here, or click to select

image-resizer.title: Image Resizer & Cropper
image-resizer.desc: Resize, crop, and convert images. Batch processing support.
image-resizer.subtitle: Batch resize images or crop them individually. Supports custom dimensions and presets.
image-resizer.crop_hint: Select an image below to Crop
image-resizer.drag_drop: Drag & drop images here, or click to select
image-resizer.crop_info: Drag on image to select area.

image-compressor.title: Image Compressor
image-compressor.desc: Compress and resize JPG, PNG, WebP images locally.
image-compressor.subtitle: Compress, resize, and convert images locally. No files uploaded to server.
image-compressor.drag_drop: Drag & drop images here, or click to select

token-generator.name: Token Generator
token-generator.desc: Generate random strings using custom characters, letters, numbers, and symbols.
token-generator.no_chars_error: Please select at least one character set or enter custom characters.

format-converter.name: Format Converter
format-converter.desc: Convert between JSON, YAML, TOML, and XML formats.
format-converter.title: Format Converter
format-converter.description: Convert between JSON, YAML, TOML, and XML formats.

device-info.name: Device Information
device-info.desc: Get detailed information about your current device, screen, and browser.
device-info.title: Device Information
device-info.description: Get detailed information about your current device, screen, and browser.

html-to-text.name: HTML to Text
html-to-text.desc: Extract text content from HTML, removing tags and scripts.

api-debugger.name: API Debugger
api-debugger.desc: Test and debug HTTP requests with ease. Support for GET, POST, PUT, DELETE.

code-formatter.name: Code Formatter
code-formatter.desc: Format your code to standard styles. Supports JS, TS, HTML, CSS, JSON, etc.

qr-generator.name: QR Code Generator
qr-generator.desc: Generate QR codes for URLs, text, and more. Customizable size and color.

perpetual-calendar.name: Perpetual Calendar
perpetual-calendar.desc: Comprehensive calendar with Chinese Lunar date, Solar terms, and festivals.

domain-valuation.name: Domain Valuation
domain-valuation.desc: Estimate domain market value based on length, TLD, and keywords.
domain-valuation.title: Domain Valuation Tool
domain-valuation.subtitle: Quickly estimate the market value of your domain
domain-valuation.disclaimer: This valuation is an algorithmic estimation and does not guarantee actual market price.

nginx-config.name: Nginx Config Generator
nginx-config.desc: Generate Nginx configuration files online with HTTPS, proxy, Gzip support.
nginx-config.title: Nginx Config Generator
nginx-config.subtitle: Generate Nginx server block configurations easily

apache-config.name: Apache Config Generator
apache-config.desc: Generate Apache VirtualHost configuration files online with HTTPS, redirects, logs.
apache-config.title: Apache Config Generator
apache-config.subtitle: Generate Apache VirtualHost configurations easily

haproxy-config.name: HAProxy Config Generator
haproxy-config.desc: Generate HAProxy load balancer configuration files with algorithms, health checks.
haproxy-config.title: HAProxy Config Generator
haproxy-config.subtitle: Generate high-availability load balancer configurations

mortgage-calculator.name: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage-calculator.desc: Calculate mortgage payments for commercial, provident fund, and combination loans.
mortgage-calculator.title: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage-calculator.subtitle: Quickly calculate your monthly mortgage payments and interest
mortgage-calculator.tip_interest: Equal Principal & Interest: Fixed monthly payment. Principal increases and interest decreases monthly.
mortgage-calculator.tip_principal: Equal Principal: Fixed monthly principal payment. Interest decreases monthly, so total monthly payment decreases.

mortgage-calculator.name: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage-calculator.desc: Calculate monthly payments for Commercial, Provident Fund, and Combination loans.
mortgage-calculator.title: Mortgage Calculator
mortgage-calculator.subtitle: Calculate your mortgage payments and interest
mortgage-calculator.tip_interest: Equal Principal & Interest: Fixed monthly payment.
mortgage-calculator.tip_principal: Equal Principal: Fixed principal payment, decreasing interest.

investment-return.name: Investment Return Calculator
investment-return.desc: Calculate compound interest with regular contributions and frequency settings.
investment-return.title: Investment Return Calculator
investment-return.subtitle: Plan your wealth growth
investment-return.empty_tip: Enter parameters and calculate to see results

roi-calculator.name: ROI Calculator
roi-calculator.desc: Calculate Return on Investment (ROI) and Annualized ROI.
roi-calculator.title: ROI Calculator
roi-calculator.subtitle: Evaluate investment profitability
roi-calculator.time_tip: Enter time to calculate Annualized ROI
roi-calculator.empty_tip: Enter investment and return amounts to calculate

otp-generator.name: OTP Generator
otp-generator.desc: Generate and verify Time-based One-Time Passwords (TOTP) for Multi-Factor Authentication.
otp-generator.title: OTP Generator
otp-generator.subtitle: Secure 2FA token generator and validator
otp-generator.scan_desc: Scan this with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)

wifi-qr.title: WiFi QR Code Generator
wifi-qr.desc: Generate and download QR codes for quick WiFi connection.
wifi-qr.subtitle: Create a QR code for your guests to connect to WiFi instantly

english-name.title: English Name Generator
english-name.desc: Generate English names based on your Chinese name.
english-name.subtitle: Find the perfect English name that matches your Chinese name
english-name.no_results: No suitable names found based on current criteria. Try different inputs.

chinese-chess.title: Chinese Chess
chinese-chess.subtitle: Challenge the AI in this classic strategy game.

go.title: Go (Weiqi)
go.subtitle: Ancient strategy board game of territory.

jungle.title: Jungle Chess
jungle.desc: Play Jungle Chess (Dou Shou Qi) against AI.
jungle.subtitle: Classic Animal Battle Game

flying_chess.title: Flying Chess
flying_chess.desc: Classic Aeroplane Chess (Ludo Variant) with AI.
flying_chess.subtitle: Battle with 3 AIs!
flying_chess.rule1: Roll 6 to launch a plane from hangar.
flying_chess.rule2: Jump (+4 tiles) if landing on same color.
flying_chess.rule3: Kick opponent back to hangar if landing on them.
flying_chess.rule4: First to fly all 4 planes to center wins.

chinese_checkers.title: Chinese Checkers
chinese_checkers.rule2: Jump over adjacent piece to empty hole.
chinese_checkers.rule4: First to fill opposite triangle wins.
